title: Need For Speed : Underground Mac (Intel only)
description:
Quick Cider port made with Transgaming\'s Cider technology. Tested and working in a 20\" intel iMac running leopard 10.5.2. This is my first torrent, so go easy on the feedback.

I can seed for quite a while at about 100Kbps, though it depends where you live in the world...if you\'re in north-eastern U.S. you should be fine.

Enjoy! ;)


DJblastyfone



EDIT: For all the people who are having issues, try messing around with your config file /Users/yourusername/Library/Preferences/Cider X3 Preferences/config (use textedit to open config file) in this file, you can also toggle fullscreen on and off, just set value to "0", same goes for FPS monitor, and for those with mac pros, or top-of-the-line macbook pros and iMacs, you can adjust the maximum screen resolution for the game. (1024 x 768 is just fine for macbook and white iMac owners like me) you can get MUCH better performance if you set the "VideoRam" variable to the amount you actually have (eg. "128")
